name: Radio Inactive
description:
Looks like in some browsers there are problems with the sprites' sorting order. Please, if you're having issues play the downloadable version (which is bug free).

Core fission risk, the reactor is unstable! Quick Steve, drop the bars! Bob will tell you how. Oh no, looks like the radio signal is unstable too.

HOW TO PLAY:

WASD or Directional Arrows to move, Space to... fix.

Follow Bob's instruction and push them all down to prevent the meltdown and win, but be careful, making a mistake will mean that more bars will activate!

Also, the core is unstable, and every few second one extra bar will activate. 

Good Luck!
